title: GoPro: Armless, Blind, Full of Hope - Trailer
description:
Overcoming their physical challenges, an armless man and his blind best friend take action in preserving their environment by planting a forest of more than 10,000 trees in rural China. Like a classic fable, this inspirational story goes beyond pollution, climate control and Mother Nature; it's an epic story that proves anyone and everyone can make a real difference in the world. 

Shot 100% on the HERO4® 

Music

William Ryan Fritch "Flutters"

asset.title: GoPro: Armless, Blind, Full of Hope - Trailer
asset.description:
Click here for the full story: https://youtu.be/Mx6hBgNNacE

Overcoming their physical challenges, an armless man and his blind best friend take action in preserving their environment by planting a forest of more than 10,000 trees in rural China. Like a classic fable, this inspirational story goes beyond pollution, climate control and Mother Nature; it's an epic story that proves anyone and everyone can make a real difference in the world. To see how you can help, visit https://goo.gl/UhScQL.

asset.author: GoPro

transcripts: When I was 3 years old, I touched a powerline. I lost both of my arms. Been disabled ever since. The quarries…. The quarries are the reason for the pollution here. How did I go blind? All because of an explosion, while working at the quarry. We asked ourselves, “What are we going to do?” We can’t just be sitting around, useless to society. But being alive means having a purpose. So we said to each other, “Let’s plant trees.”
